oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Depositions
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Greene, Colton; Civil War; military;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Depositions of Joseph W. Duncan and others taken before a military court in Ashley County, AR, in the case of the Confederate States of America versus Col. Colton Greene: although an unofficial memorandum was attached to Circular Order No. 3091 requiring government requisition of mules, Col. Greene had no knowledge of it.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Manuscript collection processed by John Jones
